Generation V.Black: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.
Generation V.White: When Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather.
Generation V.Black 2: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.
Generation V.White 2: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.

Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: When Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather.

Generation VIII.Sword: Flames spew from its tail as it flies through the sky like a jet airplane. It's said that this Pokémon will scorch the world. *
Generation VIII.Shield: According to myth, if people ignore truth and let themselves become consumed by greed, Reshiram will arrive to burn their kingdoms down. *

Generation V.Black: N's Castle or Dragonspiral Tower * ( Only one )

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Fabled Cave (requires a Level 100 Pokémon in the player's party) ( Only one )

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Ultra Space Wilds ( Rocky World ) ( Only one )

Generation VIII.Sword Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one )
